thread.title: Iggy Azalea flaunts ample bum in red bikini on holiday with new boyfriend LJay Currie

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Iggy Azalea flaunts ample bum in red bikini on holiday with new boyfriend LJay Currie
text:
Iggy Azalea flaunts ample bum in red bikini on holiday with new boyfriend LJay Currie Cosmetic surgeon says it’s “likely” the rapper’s had a ‘bum lift’ Share Iggy packed on the PDA with her producer LJay Currie seen out on a yacht with her friends in Cabo San Lucas, Mexico (Photo: FameFlynet) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Iggy Azalea showed off her killer curves in a red bikini while on on holiday with her new boyfriend LJay Currie in Mexico. 
The 26 year old showed off her ample derriere in a tiny pair of red bikini bottoms. 
She wore her long blonde hair in braids as she took to a paddle board and clambered onto a jet ski. Iggy Azalea is on holiday with her new boyfriend LJay Currie (Photo: FameFlynet) 
On board their luxurious yacht, Iggy – who split from her fiance Nick Young last year – and her new record producer boyfriend couldn’t keep their hands off each other. 
As she leaned in for a kiss, LJay’s hands slipped to her bum as he caressed her curves. 
The Black Widow rapper has regularly been asked if her figure has been enhanced by cosmetic surgery. The pair canoodled on board a luxury yacht (Photo: FameFlynet) 
Recently while appearing on American comedy series Wild ’N Out, she was asked: “Every dude in here would really like to know how much of that booty is really real.” 
She replied: “I’m gonna put you up on game. It’s real in your hands, but ya’ll don’t need to be worrying about booty that’s above your weight class.” 
Last year, Iggy thanked the plastic surgeon who gave her "perky boobs" . Iggy Azalea took to a jet ski (Photo: FameFlynet) 
The Aussie star has been open about having surgery on her nose and breasts and insisted it’s nothing to be ashamed of. 
She previously said: "I'm not denying it. Denying it is lame. I don't think you should be ashamed if you made a change to yourself, which is why I've spoken about the changes I've made, like with my breasts. 
"Your perception of yourself can change a lot over time, so I think it's important to wait and make sure it's the right choice. Plastic surgery is an emotional journey." The couple paddle boarded (Photo: FameFlynet) 
The Australian rapper has never admitted to having help with her bottom, but an expert cosmetic doctor told Mirror Online that Iggy’s figure shows tell-tale signs of a ‘butt lift’. 
"Iggy has been quite open about cosmetic surgery in the past and her body has gone through a number of changes during her career,” Dr Esho of The Esho clinic commented. 
“From these photos it seems likely she may have undergone a procedure called the Brazilian butt lift (BBL), which is a popular treatment in my clinic. 
“This is where fat is grafted and removed from the the thighs and stomach using lipo suction tools such as the lipolife by Alma. Iggy Azalea has been open about plastic surgery in the past (Photo: FameFlynet) 
“The fat is then injected and sculpted into the buttocks giving a much more full, round and lifted bottom.” 
But Dr Esho’s associate Dr Mccloskey added you have to be careful to avoid an “unnatural” look. 
“People must take care when this procedure as it's important to keep and ideal ratio between thighs, the waist and the buttocks,” he said. 
“Too much can give a very unnatural finish.”
